name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across diverse industries, particularly healthcare and finance. Proficient in **AWS**, **Serverless**, **CDK**, **Node.js**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and experienced in database management with **Postgres** and **DynamoDB**. Hands-on expertise in developing cloud-native solutions utilizing **CloudFormation**, **Lambda**, **API Gateway**, **Step Functions**, **EventBridge**, and **S3**. 
Deep understanding of infrastructure as code, implementing **GitHub Actions** for CI/CD practices, and employing **CloudWatch** for monitoring deployments. Skilled in Agile methodologies, fostering strong teamwork, interpersonal communication, and alignment with compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I have a solid foundation in Object-Oriented Programming and design patterns, with experience in testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Playwright**. Proven ability to develop innovative AI/ML-driven systems that enhance predictive analytics and real-time functionality.
